verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> <WH8761> ye the YY <WH3050>. Praise <WH1984> <WH8761> the YY <WH3068>, O my soul <WH5315>.
While I live <WH2416> will I praise <WH1984> <WH8762> the YY <WH3068>: I will sing praises <WH2167> <WH8762> unto my 'Elohim <WH430> while I have any being.
Put not your trust <WH982> <WH8799> in princes <WH5081>, nor in the son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, in whom there is no help <WH8668>.
His breath <WH7307> goeth forth <WH3318> <WH8799>, he returneth <WH7725> <WH8799> to his earth <WH127>; in that very day <WH3117> his thoughts <WH6250> perish <WH6> <WH8804>.
Happy <WH835> is he that hath the 'Elohim <WH410> of Ya`akov <WH3290> for his help <WH5828>, whose hope <WH7664> is in the YY <WH3068> his 'Elohim <WH430>:
Which made <WH6213> <WH8802> heaven <WH8064>, and earth <WH776>, the sea <WH3220>, and all that therein is: which keepeth <WH8104> <WH8802> truth <WH571> for ever <WH5769>:

Which executeth <WH6213> <WH8802> judgment <WH4941> for the oppressed <WH6231> <WH8803>: which giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> food <WH3899> to the hungry <WH7457>. The YY <WH3068> looseht <WH5425> <WH8688> the prisoners <WH631> <WH8803>:

The YY <WH3068> openeth <WH6491> <WH8802> the eyes of the blind <WH5787>: the YY <WH3068> raiseht <WH2210> <WH8802> them that are bowed down <WH3721> <WH8803>: the YY <WH3068> loveth <WH157> <WH8802> the righteous <WH6662>:

The YY <WH3068> preserveth <WH8104> <WH8802> the strangers <WH1616>; he relieveth <WH5749> <WH8766> the fatherless <WH3490> and widow <WH490>: but the way <WH1870> of the wicked <WH7563> he turneth upside down <WH5791> <WH8762>.
The YY <WH3068> shall reign <WH4427> <WH8799> for ever <WH5769>, even thy 'Elohim <WH430>, O TZiyon <WH6726>, unto all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>. Praise <WH1984> <WH8761> ye the YY <WH3050>.
